title: Camino al amor
overview: Rocco Colucci celebrates his wedding with Guadalupe when he receives a call from his sister Gina, who tells him that their father had a heart attack. Rocco had been estranged from him ever since he discovered his double life with Lili, her mother's best friend, who committed suicide after learning of her husband's betrayal. Traveling to Buenos Aires, Rocco meets the great love of his life, Malena Men√©ndez, Lili's niece.
